body:
Comment 1 by **roopeshvaddepally**: 
Can you tell me if you run these commands or added them into .bashrc file?
$export GOROOT=/home/<user>/go 
(or some other directory, make sure it is not NTFS file sysystem).

if you did, can you tell me the output of the command.
$ env | grep '^GO'

if there is not GOROOT in above output, run this command
$ export GOROOT=/home/<user>/go
